description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to improve accessibility and mobility by responding to existing and anticipated transport demand along the Harbin-Jiamusi corridor through the provision of additional railway capacity and reduction of transport time for passengers and freight.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Implementation Letter | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall cause the Harbin-Jiamusi RailwayCompany (HRC) to issue a commitment letter (the "Implementation Letter"), prior to the Effective Date, under terms and conditionsacceptable to the Bank, setting forth the obligations of HRC to assist in the implementation of Project activities, in accordancewith its terms. | Due Date :30-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Procurement | Description :The procurement of all goods and services required for the Project and to be financedout of the Loan shall be carried out by a qualified independent procurement agent, acceptable to the Bank, engaged by the ProjectImplementing Entity. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguards Implementation | Description :The Borrower shall cause Heilongjiang Province to provide full support,cooperation and assistance to the Project Implementing Entity and HRC in the carrying out of the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguards Monitoring | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall, and shall cause the Harbin-JiamusiRailway Company (HRC) as appropriate, to implement the Project in accordance with the Safeguards Instruments, all in a manner andsubstance satisfactory to the Bank, including the monitoring on a six monthly basis of the implementation of the SafeguardInstruments. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
